bonzai.api

Class Wizard

  • java.lang.Object
    • bonzai.api.Actor
      • bonzai.api.Wizard

  • public class Wizard
extends Actor
    Wizards are your main Actor. They can use castMagic on other Actors (see castMagic(Actor)). A Wizard using castMagic needs enough mana for it to be successful (see Wizard.MANA_COST_* for exact costs).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MANA_COST_ANIMATE
      This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on a Neutral Actor and the cost to teleport your hat back to your base if another team gained possession of your hat.
      static int MANA_COST_DEANIMATE
      This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on an Actor that another player owns, with the exception of another player's hat.
      static int MANA_COST_DISMISS
      This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on an Actor you own.

      • Fields inherited from class bonzai.api.Actor

        BLOCKER, CLEANER, HAT, parent, SCOUT, viewingTeam, WIZARD

    • Field Detail

      • MANA_COST_DEANIMATE

        public static final int MANA_COST_DEANIMATE
        This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on an Actor that another player owns, with the exception of another player's hat. The cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on another player's hat is MANA_COST_ANIMATE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MANA_COST_ANIMATE

        public static final int MANA_COST_ANIMATE
        This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on a Neutral Actor and the cost to teleport your hat back to your base if another team gained possession of your hat.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MANA_COST_DISMISS

        public static final int MANA_COST_DISMISS
        This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on an Actor you own.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • canCast

        public boolean canCast(Actor target)

        Determine if your Wizard can successfully cast a spell on the target given the current state and your current mana.

        Parameters:
        target - : the Actor you intend to cast a spell on.
        Returns:
        True if your wizard can cast a spell.
        False if they don't have enough mana, couldn't normally use the ability on the target, or if a null value is passed.

      • getMana

        public int getMana()

        Gets this Wizard's current mana if it is visible. Mana is the resource your Wizard uses to cast magic.

        Returns:
        The amount of mana this Wizard currently possesses. If this Wizard isn't visible, it returns -1.

      • castMagic

        public boolean castMagic(Actor target)

        Cast your wizard's spell on the target actor.

        Depending on what type of Actor the target is or what team the target Actor belongs to, this method does the following:

        Neutral: (MANA_COST_ANIMATE)
        Using this spell on a target Neutral Actor will try to place the Actor under your control, but if another Wizard uses castMagic on the target during the same turn, the target will become WILD!

        Enemy Hat (owned by another player): (MANA_COST_ANIMATE)
        Using this spell on an enemy Hat will act the same as if it were a neural actor. (See Neural target)

        Enemy Wizard: (MANA_COST_DEANIMATE)
        Using this spell on an enemy Wizard will either send the target back to base or if the target Actor also uses this spell on you, both Wizards will be stunned for 3 turns.

        Other Enemy: (MANA_COST_DEANIMATE)
        Using this spell on any other enemy actor will deanimate that actor making it neutral. If another Wizard uses castMagic on the target during the same turn, in addition to becoming neutral, the target will also become WILD!

        Friendly Hat (owned by you, not always controlled by you): (MANA_COST_ANIMATE)
        Using this spell on your Hat will teleport it to your base. Note that this refers to hats that you have captured or started with, and other players may control them in an attempt to steal it. If another Wizard uses castMagic on the target during the same turn, the target will be deanimated and also become WILD!

        Friendly (Your Actor): (MANA_COST_DISMISS)
        Using this spell on your actor will deanimate it. If another Wizard uses castMagic on the target during the same turn, the target will be deanimated and also become WILD!

        Parameters:
        target - : the Actor targeted
        Returns:
        True if your wizard can cast a spell.
        False if your wizard cannot cast magic.
        See Also:
        canCast(Actor)
